https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/niGo0iBWePLQCMYxX5wrMRXB26r.jpg An R&B singer snagged by the trappings of superstardom loses his way and turns his back on his church and faith-filled beginnings. Tragedy strikes, leaving a chance for redemption in its wake. But with rebirth, first comes death. A Beautiful Soul
